title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry the pancetta in a pan until crisp.
Beat the eggs in a bowl, then mix with the cheese and pepper.
Combine the drained spaghetti with the pancetta and remove from heat.
Quickly mix in the egg mixture, tossing until creamy.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and tikka masala spice mix for 2 hours.
Grill the chicken until cooked through.
Heat tomato puree in a pan and stir in the cream.
Add grilled chicken pieces and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan bread.
